text: Matthew Tees (13 October 1939 â€“ 4 November 2020) was a Scottish footballer. He played for Grimsby Town (two spells), Charlton Athletic and Luton Town before ending his career with Boston United in the Northern Premier League. He died on 4 November 2020. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:People from Renfrewshire Category:Scottish footballers
